# Participants

**Enumeration**

The set of participants to include in messages.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Participants
```

## Getting the set of participants

- **Participants.all**: The set of all participants.
- **Participants.only(_:)**: A custom subset of participants.
- **only(_:)**: Returns a set containing the specified participant.

## Sending data to the group

- **send(_:to:)**: Sends a standard data object asynchronously to other participants in the group session.
- **send(_:to:)**: Sends a custom type asynchronously to other participants in the group session.
- **send(_:to:completion:)**: Sends a standard data object to other participants in the group session.
- **send(_:to:completion:)**: Sends a custom type to other participants in the group session.
